The Casements Children's Corner

Search, Learn, and Create your way through "The Casements Connection"!
Are YOU ready to make "The Casements Connection"?
Click Here
UPCOMING EVENTS
Movies
on the Halifax:
will be celebrating it's 16th Anniversary in September. Join us on Friday, Septebmer 5th for a special treat under the stars! Bring your lawn chairs or blankets to enjoy "The Princess Diaries" starting at 8:00pm! Free event for all ages to enjoy!
Ormond Beach Art Walk
: Every 1st Saturday, Ormond Beach celebrates ART & CULTURE with the Ormond Beach Art Walk. On Saturday, September 6th we will feature photographs by The Casements Camera Club. Free Guided tours will be held at 4:30pm & 5:30pm led by our Casement Guild Members. The Casements Corner Gift Shop will be open with 30% off on ALL Handbags. Hope you can join us!
The Three Mrs. Flagler's
Returns! Come join us on Friday, September 12th from 6:45pm-9:00pm as we learn about Henry Flagler's three wives with stories told by Dianne Jacoby! These tantalizing tales will keep you intrigued as you sip wine and indulge in the light refreshments and desserts! Tickets are NOW on sale for $20.00 per person. Seating is limited so grab your spot soon! Advanced ticket sales only, and you must purchase in person at The Casements. Call for more information: 386-676-3216.
"Once Upon a Storytime"
Returns! Join us on the North Lawn of The Casements on Tuesday, September 16th for the first storytime of the season! Children 4 and under can listen to a short story, create a craft and enjoy a fun snack from 10:00am to 11:00am. Space is limited and advanced registration is required. Sign up on Tuesday, September 11th by completing a short Google form on Facebook. If you are not on Facebook just call the office at 386-676-3216 and staff will assist you! Hope to see you here!
Ormond Beach LIVE!:
Showcasing Local Bands and Original Music on Saturday, September 27th from 10:00am to 10:00pm. Over 100 acts, 12 Stages, 70 Artists and Trade Booths, Youth Art Contest, Food Vendors, Beer & Wine Garden and Kids Zone. Just about everything for everyone! We hope you can join us!
